summary: EcoFirst Consolidated Bhd is selling a piece of vacant land in Shah Alam at a loss to HCK Capital Group Bhd, saying the disposal will release it from the burden of monthly loan instalments of about RM1.35 million to its financier.
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (March 4): EcoFirst Consolidated Bhd is selling a piece of vacant land in Shah Alam at a loss to HCK Capital Group Bhd, saying the disposal will release it from the burden of monthly loan instalments of about RM1.35 million to its financier.

summary: Malaysia’s factory activity is expected to recover in the months following latest data indicating the mildest downturn in the manufacturing sector in one and a half years, economists said.
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (March 4): Malaysia’s factory activity is expected to recover in the months following latest data indicating the mildest downturn in the manufacturing sector in one and a half years, economists said.
